article: This story happened after the First World War. A French soldier named Frank returned to his hometown after the war.  _  he had been disabled in the war, he could hardly do anything. So before long he became very  _  . Every year the former  _  in the town would hold a party.Once the party was held in Bill's house.Since he had become a rich man,he  _  the other soldiers with a lot of good wine and tasty food. At the party,Bill was so glad that he took out a big gold  _  he had collected to  _  them. The coin was passed around.They talked and laughed.  _  ,most of them got drunk and the gold coin was soon  _  . When Bill remembered the gold coin,he found it was  _  .Everybody helped to  look for  the coin in the room,but they  _  .At that time,someone  _  that everyone in the room be searched.Everyone else  _  except Frank."I'm not a  _  ,why should I be searched?" Then he went out of Bill's house.Since then people believed that it was Frank  _  had stolen the gold coin.Frank was looked down upon from then on.All the people in the town  kept away  from him. Several years later,when Bill repaired his house,he  _  to find the gold coin in a crack of the floor.He hurried to Frank's house to tell him about it and he  _  to Frank.Then he asked Frank,"But why didn't you  _  to be searched at the time?"Hearing this Frank's face turned red."Because... my  _  was full of bread and chicken that I had taken from your table and would carry home for my hungry wife and children."
